    • Constructor Detail

      • Talon

        public Talon(PWM.PWMChannel channel)
        Instantiates a new Talon motor controller.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on

      • Talon

        public Talon(PWM.PWMChannel channel,
             java.lang.String desc)
        Instantiates a new Talon motor controller. Giving a description helps with debugging. It will be used in log outputs.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on
        desc - the description of this motor controller

      • Talon

        public Talon(PWM.PWMChannel channel,
             java.lang.String desc,
             PDP.PowerChannel pwChannel)
        Instantiates a new Talon motor controller. Giving a description helps with debugging. It will be used in log outputs. Giving a power channel will help with power logging. It will be shown as this controllers power channel on power log outputs.
        Parameters:
        channel - the pwm channel this controller operates on
        desc - the description of this motor controller
        pwChannel - The PDP(Power Distribution Panel) Channel
